name: Kowloon's Curse Demo
description:
From Studio [notes.] comes Kowloon’s Curse. 

You have been brought to “Kowloon City”, a virtual recreation of Kowloon Walled City by a man only known as Mr. Kowloon. Explore the cursed city, find out why you were brought here, and open your door to escape Kowloon City. 

  • In this demo, explore the first area of Kowloon, with the full game featuring twelve more areas.
  • Talk, plead and fight with enemies in battles reminiscent of old Megami Tensei games.
  • Uncover the mystery  of Kowloon City through various NPC conversations and events as you progress through the game. 
  • The story changes based on your actions, allowing for multiple playthroughs with different outcomes.
  • No advertisement or microtransactions. Enjoy a creepy atmospheric RPG without distractions. 

Studio [notes.] is a game developer based in Amsterdam.
